cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Rooms consist of 8 pod-style Bunk Beds. Dorms are airconditioned and have lockers, private balcony, and ensuite bathroom

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 6-Share Deluxe Ensuite Dorms feature privacy pod bunk-style beds, kitchenette with mini fridge, dining table, A/C, premium linen, balcony, room service, TV and sofa, USB ports, reading lights, shared ensuite, safe and direct access to on-site bistro.

dorms.labelDescription: Our 4-Share Superior Ensuite Dorms feature privacy pod bunk-style beds, mini fridge, A/C, premium linen, balcony, room service, TV, USB ports, reading lights, shared ensuite, safe, and direct access to the on-site bistro, bars and pool tables.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Private Deluxe Room Ensuite Dorms feature Queen-sized beds, mini fridge, A/C, premium linen, balcony, room service, TV, USB ports, reading lights, shared ensuite, safe, and direct access to the on-site bistro, bars and pool tables.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
